item.title: High as Fuck

item.title: Sunday Afternoon
item.description: [[songs/p/parkway_drive/atlas/dark_days.md#the-clock-is-ticking-cant-you-feel-our-days-are-numbered-vyl-wnanory|Ladies and gentlemen, get off the dance floor and start doing your chores, it’s Sunday afternoon!]] [[songs/a/architects/all_our_gods_have_abandoned_us/memento_mori.md#its-a-promise-that-you-cannot-break-vyl-wnanory|It’s Sunday afternoon and there a few things that I have to do.

item.title: “2 Girls 1 Cup” Song
item.description: [[songs/t/the_fair_sex/the_dark_ages/nervous_jesus.md#you-woke-up-and-rose-in-silence-vyl-wnanory|How do you show someone you love]] [[songs/t/the_fair_sex/the_dark_ages/nervous_jesus.md#you-woke-up-and-rose-in-silence-vyl-wnanory|That they are the one?]] [[songs/t/the_fair_sex/the_dark_ages/nervous_jesus.md#you-woke-up-and-rose-in-silence-vyl-wnanory|So many ways to express love]] [[songs/t/the_fair_sex/the_dark_ages/nervous_jesus.md#you-woke-up-and-rose-in-silence-vyl-wnanory|It’s hard to choose just one]] [[songs/t/the_prodigy/invaders_must_die/run_with_the_wolves.
